description: Stores a chat message or text into Langflow tables or an external memory.

inputs.name: message
inputs.info: The chat message to be stored.

inputs.name: memory
inputs.info: The external memory to store the message. If empty, it will use the Langflow tables.

inputs.name: sender
inputs.info: The sender of the message. Might be Machine or User. If empty, the current sender parameter will be used.

inputs.name: sender_name
inputs.info: The name of the sender. Might be AI or User. If empty, the current sender parameter will be used.

inputs.name: session_id
inputs.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.
